name: Self-preservation
uniques: [{Military} {non-[Air]}] units gain the [Cowardly Bunch] promotion <upon turn end>

name: Waaagh
uniques: [+1 Happiness, -1 Science] [in all cities] <when at war>

name: Light
uniques: All newly-trained [{Military} {non-[Air]}] units [in all cities] receive the [Travel Light] promotion

name: The Crusades
uniques: [Sword] units gain the [The Crusades] promotion <upon turn end>
[Gunpowder] units gain the [The Crusades] promotion <upon turn end>
[Mounted] units gain the [The Crusades] promotion <upon turn end>
[Scout] units gain the [The Crusades] promotion <upon turn end>
